::DrillBit::

"Agreed."
He opens an incodded channel to his/Killfest's troops.
"This is Commander DrillBit. Scratch that order to attck the Engine
room. Its to risky. Everyone is to attack the Bridg. Our adjective is to
kill the soldiers Megatron has there. We also hope this will draw Meg's
and his main force from the engine room. Attack now.
Killfest, lets go."
